title: Tom Rivers- spell of the past

content.question: In the first three sentences of the second paragraph (“At such . . . connection”), the narrator suggests which of the following about himself and his cousins?

choices.label: They don’t want to disrupt a particular mood.
They have a tendency to talk about themselves.
They each believe their own version of the past is the only correct one.
They cannot believe that friends from the past are still with them.

content.answer: They don’t want to disrupt a particular mood.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe the narrator or speaker of a text.
